Uses of Class
com.betabot.script.wrappers.RSNPC

  • Packages that use RSNPC 
    Package Description
    com.betabot.script.api  

    • Uses of RSNPC in com.betabot.script.api

      Fields in com.betabot.script.api with type parameters of type RSNPC 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Filter<RSNPC> NPCs.ALL_FILTER
      A filter that accepts all matches.
      Methods in com.betabot.script.api that return RSNPC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RSNPC[] NPCs.getAll()
      Returns an array of all loaded RSNPCs.
      RSNPC[] NPCs.getAll(Filter<RSNPC> filter)
      Returns an array of all loaded RSNPCs that are accepted by the provided Filter
      RSNPC NPCs.getNearest(Filter<RSNPC> filter)
      Returns the RSNPC that is nearest out of all of loaded RSPNCs accepted by the provided Filter.
      RSNPC NPCs.getNearest(int... ids)
      Returns the RSNPC that is nearest out of all of the RSPNCs with the provided ID(s).
      RSNPC NPCs.getNearest(java.lang.String... names)
      Returns the RSNPC that is nearest out of all of the RSPNCs with the provided name(s).
      Methods in com.betabot.script.api with parameters of type RSNPC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Combat.isAttacking(RSNPC npc)
      Checks if your character is interacting with an Npc.
      boolean Combat.isDead(RSNPC npc)
      Checks whether the desired Npc is dead.
      boolean Methods.verify(RSNPC npc)
      Checks for the existence of a NPC.
      Method parameters in com.betabot.script.api with type arguments of type RSNPC 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RSNPC[] NPCs.getAll(Filter<RSNPC> filter)
      Returns an array of all loaded RSNPCs that are accepted by the provided Filter
